wikipedia.title: World Class Wreckin' Cru
wikipedia.extract: World Class Wreckin' Cru was an electro music group, during the 1980s in the Los Angeles area, that contributed to rap's development. Its members Dr. Dre and DJ Yella attained greater fame as members of N.W.A, which pioneered gangsta rap. A song by the Cru had also featured R&B singer Michel'le.
